backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining comprehensive healthcare platform types (hospitals, professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances, medical records, research projects, health records, medical tourism) with role-based access control, blob storage mixins, and CRUD operations for stakeholder registration, approval workflows, and data management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting completed UI/UX updates to match McKinsey healthcare page styling, including color scheme changes in index.css and tailwind.config.js, typography updates, navigation component styling, and network map visualization implementation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing configuration, role-based dashboards, stakeholder registration pages, admin approval workflows, chatbot component, navigation with McKinsey-inspired styling, and React Query hooks for backend integration.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, including primary (deep navy), secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors with sidebar theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the AI Health Zon application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes (onboarding, home, about, solutions, healthcare support, network directory, network map, careers, vendors, ambulance, NGOs, dashboard, admin, contact, legal pages) with Layout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: Floating chatbot component with expandable interface, message history, typing indicator, and contextual AI responses about healthcare services, contact info, RCM, technology solutions, network directory, careers, vendors, ambulances, and NGOs using Royal Teal accent colors.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying brand identity, navigation links (About, Solutions, Directory, Contact), service links (Careers, Vendors, Ambulance, NGOs), legal links (Privacy, Terms, Cookies), and social media icons. Includes dynamic year and app identifier for legal document links.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component that wraps the application with Navigation header, main content area using Outlet for routing, and Footer. Provides consistent page structure across all routes.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation header with authentication, dynamic menu based on user role (admin/authenticated), and badge notification for pending admin requests. Includes mobile menu toggle and integrates Internet Identity login/logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: Displays a list of pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) with loading and empty states. Maps requests to RequestDetailCard components for individual display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form for new users to select account type (Hospital, Healthcare Professional, Vendor, NGO) and enter their name. Saves user profile using mutation hook and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Expandable card component displaying detailed request information with approve/reject actions for admin review. Supports multiple request types (professional, vendor, ambulance, NGO) and includes contact actions (WhatsApp, email) and document download functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Initializes access control with admin token and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and auth client lifecycle. Provides authentication status tracking and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating data from the backend actor, including user profiles, hospitals, healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, and registration requests with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with McKinsey-inspired design system defining CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, including color palette (navy primary, teal accent), typography styles, and sidebar/chart variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About page displaying company mission, vision, and value propositions for different stakeholders (hospitals, professionals, vendors, NGOs) with cards showing benefits and features for each group.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard that displays pending registration requests for healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, and ambulance services with tabs for managing each category and access control verification.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Page for registering ambulance services with auto-fill location from PIN code and searching for ambulance services by city, including service type selection (emergency, ICU, event) and form submission with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Careers page with a form for healthcare professionals to register by submitting their details (name, role, experience, location via PIN code lookup, contact info) and uploading a CV. Uses mutations to submit registration requests with pending status and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying company contact information (address, phone, email, WhatsApp) in cards and a contact form for users to submit inquiries. Includes a Chatbot component and simulates form submission with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that checks user authentication and profile setup status, then displays role-specific metrics cards (revenue, claims, staff, vendors, compliance for hospitals; appointments, earnings, patients for professionals). Shows ProfileSetup component if user profile is missing.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Informational page displaying 12 healthcare support service categories (workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, home healthcare, mental health, vendors, NGOs, compliance, insurance, training, logistics) in a grid of cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage with an auto-rotating hero carousel showcasing three slides with images and CTAs, followed by sections for value propositions and key features. Uses interval-based slide transitions and navigation indicators.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Displays a searchable directory of all network entities (hospitals, vendors, NGOs) with filtering by category and location. Fetches data from multiple queries and presents results in cards with contact information and links.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx: Shows a visual network map aggregating approved stakeholder locations by city/state with statistics. Displays total stakeholders, unique cities, and network status with a scrollable list of locations sorted by count.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: Provides NGO registration form with auto-fill location from PIN code and displays filterable list of registered NGOs. Handles form submission with validation and shows NGOs filtered by location and focus area.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Interactive onboarding flow that auto-plays through approving different stakeholder types (hospitals, doctors, nurses, vendors, ambulances, NGOs). Features animated approval process with skip/replay options and completion screen.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static page displaying the platform's privacy policy covering information collection, usage, sharing, security, and user rights. Formatted as a card with structured sections.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Static page outlining refund policy including eligibility, request process, processing time, non-refundable items, and cancellation terms. Presented in a card layout with organized sections.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: React component that displays the Solutions page with three main verticals: Revenue Cycle Management (RCM), Technology Solutions, and Healthcare Network, each with detailed feature lists and icons.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: React component that renders a Terms & Conditions page with sections covering acceptance of terms, use of services, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: React component for vendor registration and listing that includes a form with PIN code auto-lookup for city/state, category selection, and displays all registered vendors with their status and details.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Utility function that validates and looks up Indian PIN codes using the India Post API (postalpincode.in) to retrieve city and state information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom box shadows, and font families with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking AI Health Zon platform development with 23 versions, documenting 12-page multi-stakeholder healthcare platform architecture. Contains 50+ features including home page, RCM/technology/connecting platform sections, registration forms, admin dashboards, search directories, and approval workflows with known chatbot issue.
